author: Staff Reporter
text:
Actor Simbu is expected to appear before the personnel of the Central Crime Branch (CCB) of the Chennai City police on Monday for an inquiry into the case related to the controversial ‘Beep’ song.

The CCB had filed a First Information Report (FIR) against the actor and also music director R. Anirudh in this connection.

A senior official of the City police, who did not part with details of the status of the investigation, said the actor was directed by the Madras High Court to appear before police to record his statement.

The CCB of the Chennai City police has filed an FIR under two separate sections, including Section 67 of the Information Technology Act, 2000, and Section 292 of the Indian Penal Code.
title: Simbu likely to appear before CCB today
